Dedication to Lisa
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): Dedication to Lisa
By CHB on Monday, April 24, 2000 - 10:07 am:

First off, I know that this should be in the Library but...I wanted everyone to see it. She deserves no less and much more.


Lisa you shine bright and true; many here you touch. You do!


In you we all somehow found; a crutch, a shelter, an even ground.


In my time that I was here; you were the one that Bobby feared.


All in all he knew as well; You'd lead us from his loser hell.


We rallied behind you as our saint; This board Fat-ass shall no longer taint.


You are the one, our guard, our queen; You protect us from such a vile thing.


You pulled out the stops and forward we shown; To this place we came, we now call home.


So here is a tribute Lisa, as you continue to guide us; though it barely does you your proper justice.


Cyberhillbilly, a.k.a CHB
